Articles.Content:
I have two joysticks, a logitech dual action and logitech wingman digital 3d. Both of them seem to work while configuring the controls, but in-game only the buttons work and the sticks don't seem to do anything. They both work fine for other games. Can anyone help me?

 

EDIT: Never mind, I figured it out. I just had set the joystick for primary as well as secondary, now it works fine. If anyone has the same problem, make sure that you set BOTH parts in the joystick configuring panel section and then see if it works.

Edited December 18, 2018 by FellowBob
